summary: The bill, the Telemental Health Care Access Act of 2025, amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to expand coverage for mental and behavioral health services furnished through telehealth. It specifically modifies Section 1834(m)(7) to include "mental and behavioral health services furnished through telehealth" and clarifies the inclusion of behavioral health services. The amendments are to be effective as if included in the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021.
